attributes.action: Stop government departments providing inaccurate information on wireless safety
attributes.background: Public Health England & DHSC have provided inaccurate, incorrect & misleading info. on the safety of radiofrequency radiation (RFR) to MPs & the public (1). We ask for their AGNIR 2012 report to be retracted(1) and advice updated based on accurate evidence; all conflicts of interest to be addressed.
